languages.text: "Ха!" {n}Хейнрикс смеется — смех похож на хриплый грай умирающей птицы.{/n} "В твоих словах есть доля истины, {name}. Да, так и есть. Доля истины".
"Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."
languages.original_text: "Ха!" {n}Хейнрикс смеется — смех похож на хриплый грай умирающей птицы.{/n} "В твоих словах есть доля истины, {name}. Да, так и есть. Доля истины".

traits.locale_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “哈！”{n}海因里希笑了起来，笑声仿佛垂死的鸟发出的嘎嘎声。{/n}“你的话不无道理，{name}。是啊，不无道理，事实就是如此。”
languages.original_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."

traits.locale_text: “哈！”{n}海因里希笑了起来，笑声仿佛垂死的鸟发出的嘎嘎声。{/n}“你的话不无道理，{name}。是啊，不无道理，事实就是如此。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ja!». {n}La risa de Heinrix es como el graznido ronco de un pájaro al borde de la muerte.{/n} «Hay una pizca de verdad en sus palabras, {name}. Sí, así es. Una pizca de verdad».
languages.original_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja!». {n}La risa de Heinrix es como el graznido ronco de un pájaro al borde de la muerte.{/n} «Hay una pizca de verdad en sus palabras, {name}. Sí, así es. Una pizca de verdad».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「は！」{n}ハインリックスの笑い声は死にかけの鳥の鳴き声のように聞こえる。{/n}「あなたの言葉には一片の真実がありますね、{name}さん。そう、たしかに。一片の真実が」
languages.original_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."

traits.locale_text: 「は！」{n}ハインリックスの笑い声は死にかけの鳥の鳴き声のように聞こえる。{/n}「あなたの言葉には一片の真実がありますね、{name}さん。そう、たしかに。一片の真実が」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ha ! » {n}Le rire d'Heinrix ressemble au râle d'agonie d'un oiseau mourant.{/n} « Il y a une part de vérité là-dedans, {name}. Oui, c'est indéniable. »
languages.original_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! » {n}Le rire d'Heinrix ressemble au râle d'agonie d'un oiseau mourant.{/n} « Il y a une part de vérité là-dedans, {name}. Oui, c'est indéniable. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix' Lachen klingt wie das heisere Krächzen eines Vogels im Todeskampf.{/n} "In Euren Worten liegt ein Körnchen Wahrheit, {name}. Ja, in der Tat. Ein Körnchen Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."

traits.locale_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix' Lachen klingt wie das heisere Krächzen eines Vogels im Todeskampf.{/n} "In Euren Worten liegt ein Körnchen Wahrheit, {name}. Ja, in der Tat. Ein Körnchen Wahrheit."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix'in sesi, ölen bir kuşun kulak tırmalayıcı gaklamasını andırıyor.{/n} "Sözlerinde gerçeklik payı var {name}. Evet, var gerçekten. Bir miktar."
languages.original_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix's laughter sounds like the rasping caw of a dying bird.{/n} "There is a grain of truth to your words, {name}. Yes, there is indeed. A grain of truth."

traits.locale_text: "Ha!" {n}Heinrix'in sesi ölen bir kuşun kulak tırmalayıcı gaklamasını andırıyor.{/n} "Sözlerinde gerçeklik payı var {name}. Evet, var gerçekten. Bir miktar."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
